name: himawari
description: Experience the latest image from the Himawari 8 satellite every time you open a new tab in Chrome or Firefox.

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:firefox && npm run bundle:chrome
scripts.bundle:chrome: cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && zip himawari_chrome.zip lib/* icons/*.png index.html style.css bundle.js options.js options.html Roboto_Slab/*.ttf manifest.json
scripts.bundle:firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && zip himawari_firefox.zip lib/* icons/*.png index.html style.css bundle.js options.js options.html Roboto_Slab/*.ttf manifest.json

author: Dominik Moritz
